author: mehmet-murat-ildan
quotes: The train may fall in love with a station, but it has to go and it goes! Don't be like the train; stay at the station you fell in love, go nowhere!
Are you looking for gold, friend? Look around you; anything useful to you is pure gold, pure silver!
Solitude is the path to visit yourself, it is the path to yourself!
Consistency is a contraceptive; it prevents the birth of new things!
Let those who sit know that this world is not a waiting room; it is an arena to struggle, an arena for action! Let the inactive remember that we were born to act, not to sit!
Moments of thinking are your military moments because they are the moments where you take the opportunity to attack and eliminate your problems!
A street that you have never visited is a book that you have never read! You never know what you are missing!
Even if it is made up of gold, the sailing boat can go nowhere without the humble wind!
Instead of politicians, let the monkeys govern the countries; at least they will steal only the bananas!
Walls are made of fear; bridges are made of love!
For a stairs to be safe, every step on that stairs has to be safe!
It is always a great honor to be the driver of your own car, to be the boss of your own fate!
Heavy fog is a weird guide! If you go on a journey with him, it takes you from nowhere and leaves you at nowhere!
Big storms create big captains and they destroy the little ones!
No king has a throne more beautiful than a bench covered with the autumn leaves!
Simple and plain things can touch your heart very easily! If you can be simple and plain, you can touch every heart!
Enlarge your windows till you get a window where you can see the whole universe with one look!
When the situation is serious, don’t be funny; and when the situation is funny, don’t be serious!
Our dreams are our precious diamonds; without them, we are endlessly poor. Let us perpetually dream to be overly wealthy!
In matters of healing the body or the mind, vacation is a true genius!
A little spoon for a cup of soup teaches to be patient; and the big one, to be greedy!
An autumn forest is such a place that once entered you never look for the exit!
Waterfalls are exciting because they have power, they have rainbows, they have songs, and they have boldness and craziness!
There will be always something old in the New Year!
An umbrella with many holes is better than no umbrella!
The fate of the bridges is to be lonely; because bridges are to cross not to stay!
If you are good at building bridges, you will never fall into the abyss!
Like a breakfast time or lunch time, you must have a thinking time! Without eating and thinking we cannot stick to the existence; without them we cannot stay in the port of this universe!
The road may be beautiful or ugly; it may be easy or hard, smooth or rough, it doesn't matter; what matters most is where the road will take you!
In your most desperate moments where you crawl on the ground like worms, sometimes you suddenly hear the voice of a savior, the voice of the Music which immediately carries you away to the stars!
For a new year to bring you something new, make a move, like a butterfly tearing its cocoon! Make a move!
The footprints of a free-minded man are always towards the forward direction.
Environmental pollution is not only humanity's treason to humanity but also a treason to all other living creatures on earth!
No man has ever seen a turtle climbing the wall. In order to do the things which are impossible for you, you need to change yourself, and better still, transform yourself into something new!
You cannot disgrace a disgraceful man; you cannot make a shameless man feel ashamed; you cannot make a cockroach a cockroach, because it is already a cockroach!
Boat is nothing without water and man without his dreams!
Those who mastered in the art of falling have no fear of rising!

We touch people mostly without touching them: We touch them with our words, with our smile, with our eyes, with our courage, with our madness, with millions of different ways! What are we? We are contacting beings without contacting!
If you have a footprint, be happy, because it means that you aren't a shadow!
When the water is calm, take as much distance as possible with your boat!
The more money you spend on guns, the less money you spend on people! More weapons, less happiness; more guns, more misery!
Regular and simple life is the life of God; the chaotic and the complex one is the Devil's!
Flexibility is one of the main roads leading to happiness.
On a sunny clear day, you can improve your body; on a rainy fogy day, you can improve your mind!
I prefer to sail in a bad ship with a good captain rather than sail in good ship with a bad captain.
Many trains arrive at your station; treat them good whether they stay or leave!
Rock is a great master of life. It teaches us this simple philosophy: Stay firm!
Some bridges are so beautiful that we wish them to be our own home!
Every time it rains, the soil counts every drop to know exactly how many times to thank to God!
You can never be too far away from a disaster, because there is no disaster-free zone in this entire universe!
Double face in a person is no problem as long as both faces are more or less the same!
New Year's most glorious light is sweet hope!
What makes a man heavy is the gravity of virtue. Without it, man will be so light that he will be drifted in the winds of immorality.
Unless you accept anyone to be your boss, no man can be your boss!
The concept of fate is an open insult against man's willpower!
Wind is the sacred music of the leaves; wherever and whenever the wind blows, over there leaves start their holy dancing frantically!
If only a horrible storm can demolish the castle of the devil, then let the storm be victorious! It is not uncommon that heaven comes after hell!
Be asÂ usefulÂ as a tree! Give life to others; be shelter to everyone; grant fruits to all! Be good like a tree!
Moving forward is not always good, especially when there is a precipice ahead! Know to turn back! Know to step back! Sometimes moving backwards is moving forward!
Don't be afraid of an endless road, but the road with an end!
The greatest victory for man is not that his dreams were fulfilled but it is that to stand upright even when none of his dreams were fulfilled!.
A dull speech which is full of truths is much more brilliant than an eloquent speech which is full of lies!
If you have the power to resurrect the dead man, firstly, be sure that he is a good man!
Till we attain immortality, all life will remain just an illusion!
Instead of building castles against your enemies, build bridges for them to come to you!
To reach your target quicker, don't lose your time by looking back!
We see what we are only through reflection and thus the more our reflections occur, the less our mistakes will be!
Bridges are happy, because they do not judge those who come to them.
Not all the snakes are poisonous and not all the poisons are deadly! Keep this in mind when bitten.
Even if you enter the dirty water, stay neat like a white swan!
If you are not rising with ethics, you will sink with every rise!
If you are planning to work very hard, start working by screwing around! Lounge about at home; fool around in the streets or in the fields! Laziness will fill you with energy!
Frog in the mud is happier than the man, because it has no ambition to reach the stars!
In a very cold night, even houses want to have houses of their own to enter inside them and feel warm!
When the river meets the sea, he dies! Because the character of the river is to flow and when the character dies, everything dies!
There are two kinds of diamonds in this world: The diamond itself and the eyes full of love!
Kings also sleep; but the clever ones, with one eye open, just like dolphins and whales.
A street full of shadows will teach you what life is much better than the street full of lights!
If the gates are open, walk in; if the gates are close, find a way and move in!
As long as you keep on walking on the old paths, you will never have footprints on the new paths!
Little minds try to solve the matters through violence and darkness; great minds try to solve the matters through love and light!
You are an ordinary person till the day you realise that you have the power to change the world!
Appreciate water before you are thirsty! Appreciate all the good things before you need them!
If the road is beautiful, walk the road slowly; be a turtle, be a snail and even better than this: Stop walking; live the road fully!
A country which prefers guns to flowers will live the beauty of the flowers only in its graveyards!
Be different so that people can see you clearly amongst the crowds.
In the twilight of the morning, all life silently waits for the sunrise. Sun must rise for the darkness to sink!
When the life is wavy, keep your mind smooth.
The most dangerous enemy is the one who can easily make friends with his potential victims!
To be a believer does not make you superior to others; but to be a humanist does make it so!
Even just seconds ahead is unknown; even just seconds after is open to infinite possibilities.
A seagull flying beautifully is heaven; a seagull hunting an innocent fish is hell! Existence is heaven and hell, joy and horror!
The windows of the houses – even if the house is ramshackle – are always beautiful because windows represent light!
You may lose your path, but you must never lose your hope, because hope is the path to all the paths!
If you have live in the mud for a while, you must not resist being a frog for a while!
You are waiting for something good to come; but you know, if the life is also waiting, then nothing will happen, nothing will come!
Divorce is a fire exit.When a house is burning,it doesn't matter who set the fire.If there is no fire exit,everyone in the house will be burned!
During the late nights, try to walk in the empty streets with an empty mind! Light of wisdom will soon accompany you!
Let the people discover you! You might have the key of the locked doors in their lives! Open yourself to the world; you might be the magic the world needs!
Idealists are not the good friends of the truths; they create their own truth.
In the empire of desert, water is the king and shadow is the queen.
When the night comes, streets welcome the lonely souls because they alone can fully understand the lonely streets!
Knowledge is the only water which makes one thirsty when it is drunk.
The wisdom of the Moon is greater than the wisdom of the Earth, because the Moonsees the universe better than the Earth can see it!
Frog in a little pond can be much happier than fish in a vast ocean!
Life is meaningless; man's biggest challenge is to make it meaningful.
Like a garbage truck, we need a lie-truck which will collect lies from everyone's houses every morning, even every hour.
To be pessimist is to amputate one's own legs and arms! Only an optimist man has the ability to move!
If you feel you have to open a particular door, open it, otherwise all your life that door will haunt your mind!
The first step to be a good man is this. You must deeply feel the burden of the stones some else is carrying

Roof of your house is not your real roof; the walls of your house are not your real walls, your fists are not your real fists! Your real roof, your real wall, your real fist, your real shield is your right thinking! It is your right thinking that protects you from every danger!
Stay calm inside! You will then see that outside storms of life, even the most terrible ones, will turn into soft winds.
Farewell is a beautiful and a soft word and yet it is a horrible and a heavy thing too!
Sunset is a wonderful opportunity for us to appreciate all the great things the sun gives us!
Fame is like a castle. Castles are beautiful to dream and wonderful to watch, but too encircled to live in!
There are streets to enjoy, there are streets to wander aimlessly and also there are streets to contemplate!
If you don’t know the art of disappearance, learn it because you will need it every time you get bored of the society you are living in!
There is one thing we must appreciate about the disasters: They are perfectly just when they do their jobs!
Any man who pursues for peace is a remarkable man!
Inside the fogs, you think better and thus you see better!
Sunset is the opening music of the night.
Live a simple life; you will own the most beautiful treasures of the world!
Willpower is the shortest shortcut to success.
Remember the unremembered; love the unloved; salute the unsaluted; hear the unheard; do the things which have not been done!
If a railroad is bent, the train shall turn over; if a man's character is bent, he shall turn over just like that train.
Only a sheep with lion's heart can attack wolf, not the sheep with lion's teeth or with lion's claw.
Be like a train; go in the rain, go in the sun, go in the storm, go in the dark tunnels! Be like a train; concentrate on your road and go with no hesitation!
Fight for your existence and when doing this, try to be just to others! You have no job other than this in this universe!
Here is the best wish for the new year: Let there be more freedom of thought throughout the world! Fields need rain; truths need freedom of thought!
If you think life is a smooth sea, you will soon be awakened from this sweet dream by the slap of a bitter wave!
A lighthouse is not interested in who gets its light! It just gives it without thinking! Giving light is its nature!
If you are strong enough, you can enjoy even in the middle of a storm!
When feeling sad, dream on! When feeling happy, dream on! You shall survive by means of your dreams!
There is a hidden message in every waterfall. It says, if you are flexible, falling will not hurt you!
Every sunny morning is a great fountain; we quaff 'sweet hope' from it.
Not every lake dreams to be an ocean. Blessed are the ones who are happy with whom they are.
I like my shadow; it reminds me that I exist.
From the same window, you keep seeing the same view!
Everywhere we see shadowy minds, cloudy brains! World needs more light of wisdom!
A sad soul needs an infinite horizon which can throw all his sorrow into the silence of the eternal emptiness!
An endless path is frightening but the path that ends is even more frightening!
Wherever wind visits, there it freshens the air; wherever wisdom visits, there it freshens the mind!
Man must behave like a lighthouse; he must shine day and night for the goodness of everyman.
By staying calm, you increase your resistance against any kind of storms.
A lonely autumn leaf on the road by sticking to another one becomes more resistant to harsh winds. Unity is the midwife of security!
Choose the paths which are not worn out by many feet!
To live is to paint, it is to create; but while we are painting, we are being painted, being created as well!

Your failure is a great teacher for you and it can also be a great teacher for others! Thus, when you fail, the experiences you gained and your invaluable indirect help to others must be your greatest consolation!
A horrible night might be hidden in a beautiful morning!
An arrow is never afraid of shooting from the bow; but it is afraid of not reaching the target!
If you are a sparrow, don't attack the eagle; be wise! If you are an eagle, don't attack the sparrow; be just!
The wind is like the golden breath of the world; when it blows, we feel that the world is alive and so are we!
In the New Year, never forget to thank to your past years because they enabled you to reach today! Without the stairs of the past, you cannot arrive at the future!
Eagle rises to the top of the precipice with its wings; man, to the top of the honour, with his morals!
While sleeping in a hammock, with the touch of a warm wind we remember why we are in love with the life!
If possible, avoid being a bubble; for a bubble, even the gentlest touch is fatal.
Summit of the well is the bottom of the ground! Man who has climbed up from the very low thinks that he did climb up to the very top!
All the doors you ignored or refused to enter represents your uncreated fates!
Those waters which leave the main stream either cannot reach the sea and disappear in inland or find a better place, a beautiful lake.
You cannot separate the old furniture from the memories and the memories from the old furniture!
The whispering of the truth is stronger than the thunderstorm of the untruth!
If you want the people to understand you, invite them to your life and let them see the world from your window!
It is not possible for a house to own a spirit without owning windows with flowers!
No dark cloud can forever prevent the sun from shining!
True, the lion is a mighty, noble animal, but it is an animal nevertheless!
If there is a nice road to your destination, you are lucky; if there isn't any, then you are even luckier because you will have the chance to be a road-creator!
Silent streets have many things to say.
The presence of even a single poor child on the street means a million defeats for mankind.
Have you ever seen a donkey smelling a beautiful rose? Donkeys aren't interested in roses, they like thorn bushes or watermelon rinds!
The streets have two spirits: One is its own spirit and the other spirit is all the living creatures living in the street!
In the cold dark days of the winter, dream about the flowers to get warmed up!
Waiting makes wine better; but waiting makes man decay! Don't wait because you have no time! Move fast!
The strange thing about the sunset is that we actually don't want the sun to set, we want it to stay right on the horizon, not below it, not above it, just right on it!
A journey to the unknown shores needs a port, a ship, a wind; but more important than all of them: Courage; courage to leave the known for the unknown!
The wiser you become, the lesser you will be surprised!
A boat without captain cannot remain long on the surface!
